attributes.action: A new Welsh Referendum on Abolishing the Welsh Assemby Government
attributes.additional_details: Welsh Gov is a total waste of money providing yet another tear of  bureaucracy and soaring cost which the Welsh people just will not suffer any more
attributes.background: Force Welsh Gov to have a Referendum  to see if people in Wales still want Welsh Independance and the Welsh Assemby Gov.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for the same action:

Hold a referendum on ending devolution in Wales
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643987
